itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday August 20, 2014
teaser: Housing starts are up. What’s driving the encouraging increase? We look at the role of first-time home buyers. Plus, Uber has launched a new home delivery service called Corner Store. Customers can order items from a CVS or Walgreens and have them delivered right to their doorstep. Other companies have launched their own delivery services of late, including Google. Will this latest venture from Uber succeed in a growing market, and with its built in fleet of drivers, does it have the advantage?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday August 20, 2014
description: Housing starts are up. What’s driving the encouraging increase? We look at the role of first-time home buyers. Plus, Uber has launched a new home delivery service called Corner Store. Customers can order items from a CVS or Walgreens and have them delivered right to their doorstep. Other companies have launched their own delivery services of late, including Google. Will this latest venture from Uber succeed in a growing market, and with its built in fleet of drivers, does it have the advantage?
byline: Scott Tong, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Adrienne Hill, Dan Abendschein, Rob Schmitz, Sam Beard, D Gorenstein and David Brancaccio
